t: Anybody tried a PoLe.Craft knife yet? | BladeForums.com
s: They are all rip-off designs copied from real knifemakers/brands. The one you like appears to be a design stolen from Extreme Ratio. At those prices, they're made in China at some counterfeit factory and then have the your company name lasered or silkscreened on them.
